text: West Bethel is an unincorporated village in the town of Bethel, Oxford County, Maine, United States. The community is located along U.S. Route 2 and the Androscoggin River northwest of Paris. West Bethel has an active post office opened January 12, 1837. The post office was originally located in the store on the corner of Flat Rd. West Bethel has its own ZIP code, 04286. ==References== Category:Villages in Oxford County, Maine Category:Villages in Maine
title: West Bethel, Maine
